The model is extremely unconventional, in that it was actually built for Minecraft. Yes, minecraft, this is what it would normally look like:

http://s23.postimg.org/bnqux2l3v/image.jpg

Poly count should be unusually high seeing as the thing is built of 1127 individual boxes (the entire vehicle that is, the turret is roughly 300-400, so 4-5k triangles).

As for scale, what can I say, I'm a sucker for big guns XD.
